dict.acceptation: 财产，遗产，房地产；个人财产；不动产权；（较高的）社会地位；
（汽车）连箱的（拥有较长的车身和后门，后座后面有较大的空间）；

sent.orig: Real estate agencies include real estate appraisal, real estate consulting and real estate agent.
sent.trans: 房地产中介行业包括房地产价格评估、房地产咨询和房地产代理。

sent.orig: Real estate law is not the forte of real estate attorneys and real estate agents only.
sent.trans: 房地产法律并非专长房地产律师和房地产经纪人只。

sent.orig: Real estate: The real estate sector saw sustainable and rapid development.
sent.trans: 房地产业： 房地产业持续快速发展。

sent.orig: The reform of estate tax should take the macro-viewpoint and re-design the real-estate tax system.
sent.trans: 房地产税制的改革，应从宏观着眼，重构我国房地产税制体系。

sent.orig: Beijing develops head office into estate greatly is company of development a state-owned and large estate.
sent.trans: 北京市大成房地产开发总公司是一家国有大型房地产开发企业。
